Major_Arcs.title: The Circus Saga
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's adventures in a circus setting, including his performance, conflicts with other characters, and his ultimate departure.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Debut and Public Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Paul Bunyan as a circus performer and the arrival of the public at the circus grounds.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Circus and the Giraffe

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan intervenes in a threat, leading to an unexpected ambush.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Cry for Help and Confronting Billings

sub_scenes.title: The Circus Owner's Offer
sub_scenes.description: An unexpected turn of events leads to the circus owner offering Paul Bunyan's help and a job.

narrative_arcs.title: The Proposition: Becoming the New Strong Man

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Sabotage
sub_scenes.description: Driven by envy, Matto Grasso plots and executes acts of sabotage against Paul Bunyan and the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Matto Grasso's Envy
Matto's Renewed Sabotage: The Ape Release
Discovery of the Loose Ape and Paul's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Arena Chaos and Weight Throwing
sub_scenes.description: Chaos unfolds in the arena as performers react to the ape situation and further sabotage occurs.

narrative_arcs.title: Arena Observation and Intention to Intervene

sub_scenes.title: Matto and Sonny's Fight and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: A brawl breaks out between Matto Grasso and Sonny, leading to an unexpected rescue by Paul Bunyan and a resolution by authorities.

narrative_arcs.title: Rejection of Strongman Offer and Departure

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Eastern Encounters
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Marco Polo's perilous adventures in the East, including encounters with mythical figures and quests.

sub_scenes.title: Ogress and Severed Head in Tibet
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo faces danger in Tibet and stumbles upon a talking severed head.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Awful Ogress of Tibet
Discovery of the Severed Talking Head
The Severed Head's Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Rescue, Dagger, and Journey to Hi-Toun
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo rescues a man, receives a magical dagger, and sets off for Hi-Toun.

sub_scenes.title: Hi-Toun and the Missing Princess
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo arrives at Hi-Toun, learns of the missing Princess Lotus, and encounters a deceptive old woman.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hi-Toun and King's Welcome
The King's Grief and the Missing Princess Lotus
Encounter with a Starving Mother and the Witch's Castle

sub_scenes.title: The Ogress's Castle and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo enters the witch's castle, discovers the Ogress's true form, and is attacked by her mice.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and Meeting the 'Children'
Confrontation with the Mice and Sword Defense

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Rescue from the Ogress
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo is captured by the cloaked figure and snakes, but a prisoner with a special knife and Princess Lotus plan their escape from the Ogress.

sub_scenes.title: Palace and Marriage Proposal
sub_scenes.description: Escape from the dungeon leads to the palace where a marriage proposal is presented as a reward.

narrative_arcs.title: Dungeon Escape and Journey to Father
Palace Arrival, Mourning Confusion, and Marriage Reward

Major_Arcs.title: The Tale of Treachery and Treasure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a story within the comic about a hidden treasure, betrayal, and the consequences of greed.

sub_scenes.title: Narrator and Penal Colony Introduction
sub_scenes.description: A storyteller begins a tale of treasure, shifting to a British penal colony.

narrative_arcs.title: Prison Colony Labor and Guard Check
Request to Speak with Captain Brooking

sub_scenes.title: Bribe and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: A prisoner tries to bribe Captain Brooking with a share of hidden treasure, leading to betrayal.

sub_scenes.title: Revenge and Freedom
sub_scenes.description: The prisoner discovers the betrayal, vows revenge, and eventually gains his freedom.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Betrayal and Captain's Escape
Release from Servitude and Fare to England
Arrival in England and Renewed Vengeance

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Fatal Outcome
sub_scenes.description: The prisoner tracks down Captain Brooking, leading to a confrontation and deadly struggle over the treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Ascent to the Attic and Discovery of Treasure

sub_scenes.title: Police Intervention and Moral Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: Police respond to the crime scene, leading to a chase and the storyteller concluding with a moral lesson.

narrative_arcs.title: Responding to Gunshot and Finding the Body
Aftermath and Calling the Homicide Squad
Moral of the Story: Money is Evil

Major_Arcs.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dr. Styx and Henry Northrup as they investigate supernatural events at the Matthews Estate, haunted by Vincent Matthews's past crimes.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Dr. Styx and the Case
sub_scenes.description: Dr. Styx is introduced, followed by the sentencing of Vincent Matthews, setting the stage for the haunted estate mystery.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation Begins at Matthews Estate
sub_scenes.description: Henry Northrup and Dr. Styx arrive at the Matthews Estate to investigate the haunting.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Warning at Matthews Place

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews' Ghost
sub_scenes.description: Henry enters the haunted house and confronts the spectral form of Vincent Matthews.

narrative_arcs.title: Warning Before Entering the Haunted House
Unexpected Strength and Shift in Power

sub_scenes.title: Philosophical Debate and Revelation
sub_scenes.description: A philosophical confrontation ensues, revealing a shocking truth about Henry's past and a paradoxical solution.

narrative_arcs.title: The Horrifying Revelation of Rosalind's Murder and Forgiveness

sub_scenes.title: Summoning and Resolution with Rosalind
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind's spirit is summoned to confront Vincent, leading to forgiveness and resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Rest and Conditional Forgiveness
The Test of Brotherly Love and Rejection

Major_Arcs.title: The Voyages of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc chronicles Henry Hudson's persistent and ultimately tragic quest for the Northwest Passage to China.

sub_scenes.title: Commissioning the Voyage
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Henry Hudson's fate and his commission by the Dutch East India Company.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dutch East India Company's Request

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage and False Hope
sub_scenes.description: Hudson's first voyage faces crew unrest and explores the Hudson River, leading to disappointment.

narrative_arcs.title: Threat of Mutiny and Change of Course
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Resolve and Return to Holland

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage and Mutiny's End
sub_scenes.description: Hudson's second voyage ends tragically with mutiny and his abandonment.

narrative_arcs.title: New Company and Continued Search for Passage
Extreme Northerly Route and Icebound Ship
Winter Quarters and Waiting for Spring Thaw
The Ice Melts and Voyage Resumes
Crew's Refusal and Demand to Return Home
Mutineers Return Home and Face Justice

Major_Arcs.title: Hassan and the Caliph's Daughter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Hassan, the Arabian Knight, on a mission to rescue the Caliph's daughter, culminating in action and romance.

sub_scenes.title: The Caliph's Command
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is summoned by the Caliph and tasked with a dangerous rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: The Summons and the Dangerous Mission
The Rescue Mission: Daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali

sub_scenes.title: Journey and Oasis Warning
sub_scenes.description: Hassan embarks on his journey, receiving warnings about the dangers ahead.

narrative_arcs.title: Signs of the Enemy at the Oasis

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Capture at Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: Hassan infiltrates the Tartar camp, makes contact with the daughter, but is quickly discovered and captured.

narrative_arcs.title: Approaching the Tartar Camp Under Nightfall
Cloak as a Disguise and Infiltration Plan
Reaching the Prisoner's Tent and Contact
Discovery and Confrontation by Tartar Guards
Capture and Recognition as an Outsider

sub_scenes.title: Trial by Combat and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is challenged to combat by Kurgan, where he must fight unarmed for a chance at freedom and the daughter's release.

narrative_arcs.title: Terms of Combat and Kurgan's Doubt
Victory Shout and Defiant Last Words

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Resolution and Farewell
sub_scenes.description: Hassan secures the daughter's release, and a romantic connection develops as they return to Bagdad.

narrative_arcs.title: Impending Departure and a Necessary Kiss
